name.japanese: ペローナの不思議の庭

description: A bizarre garden within Thriller Bark mansion filled with animal zombies and hybrid creatures. This area serves as Perona's domain where she commands her army of Wild Zombies.

keyEvents.title: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper Arrive
keyEvents.description: The trio escapes from their coffin and discovers Perona's Wonder Garden filled with zombie animals.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of this location, introducing it as a key battleground in the Thriller Bark arc.

keyEvents.title: Inuppe Debuts in the Garden
keyEvents.description: Inuppe, a penguin-dog zombie with Sanji's shadow, appears among the Wild Zombies.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces Inuppe as a notable Wild Zombie.

keyEvents.title: Wild Zombies Attack
keyEvents.description: Multiple animal zombies attack Nami, Usopp, and Chopper in the garden.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the garden as a dangerous area filled with hostile zombies.

geography.terrain: Garden with pillars, vegetation, and open areas
notableFeatures: Connected to Thriller Bark mansion interior

culturalSignificance: Represents Perona's dream of ruling over a cute zombie animal kingdom, reflecting her childlike desires contrasted with the dark zombie theme.

statusHistory.description: Functioning as Perona's domain filled with Wild Zombies

description: The massive gothic mansion on Thriller Bark where Gecko Moria resides. Contains multiple rooms, hallways lined with armor, laboratories, and various chambers for the zombies.

keyEvents.title: Lola Confronts Absalom
keyEvents.description: Lola pursues Absalom through the mansion with marriage proposals.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the mansion as a setting for character interactions.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Disappears
keyEvents.description: While exploring armor-lined hallways, Zoro mysteriously vanishes from Luffy's group.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion's complex layout allows for crew members to become separated.

keyEvents.title: Discussion of Shadow Theft
keyEvents.description: The crew discusses the consequences of losing one's shadow while exploring the mansion.
keyEvents.significance: Builds tension and establishes the stakes within the mansion.

geography.terrain: Multi-level mansion with corridors, rooms, and chambers

culturalSignificance: A gothic horror setting that serves as the main battleground for the Thriller Bark arc, filled with zombies and mysteries.

statusHistory.description: Functioning as Gecko Moria's base of operations
